fullText: This revival of Lerner and Loewe's 1960 musical, directed by Bartlett Sher, brings new life to the Arthurian legend with a cast led by Andrew Burnap and Phillipa Soo.
dtliExcerpt: This revival of Lerner and Loewe's 1960 musical, directed by Bartlett Sher, brings new life to the Arthurian legend with a cast led by Andrew Burnap and Phillipa Soo.
showScoreExcerpt: This revival of Lerner and Loewe's 1960 musical, directed by Bartlett Sher, brings new life to the Arthurian legend with a cast led by Andrew Burnap and Phillipa Soo.
nycTheatreExcerpt: "The funniest and most invigorating new show on Broadway...Winner of the 2022 Pulitzer Prize, "Fat Ham" recasts its source material to imagine what Shakespeare did not  how people might overcome circumstances, expectations and their own demons to forge new paths through life."
